problem: 如图,AB是⊙O的弦,OC⊥AB于点C,若AB=16cm,OC=6cm,则⊙O的半径为()
answer: 【解答】解:∵OC⊥AB于点C,OC过O,AB=16cm,∴AC=\frac{1}{2}AB=8cm,∠ACO=90°,∴由勾股定理得:AO=√{AC²+CO²}=√{8²+6²}=10(cm),
comment: 本题考查了勾股定理和垂径定理的应用,题目是一道比较好的题目,难度适中．
problem_en: As shown in the figure, AB is the chord of ⊙O, OC ⊥ AB at point C, if AB = N_0, OC = N_1, then the radius of ⊙O is ()
